datasets.name: 6b9937de
datasets.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
  BP.check_id,
  BP.check,
  BP.severity,
  BP.doc_url as Recommendation,
  BP.recommendation as Rec_text,
  BP.category,
  WRC.check_time,
  WRC.chk_date,
  WRC.workspace_id,
  concat(ac.workspace_name, " (", ac.workspace_id, ")") as name,
  SC.score as Status,
  WRC.run_id
FROM 
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks SC
JOIN 
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices BP ON SC.id = BP.id
JOIN 
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete WRC ON WRC.run_id = SC.run_id
INNER JOIN hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces ac
  ON wrc.workspace_id = ac.workspace_id
WHERE BP.category = 'Data Protection' AND SC.workspaceid = WRC.workspace_id
ORDER BY Status DESC;

datasets.name: f617666b
datasets.query:
SELECT
  sc.workspaceid,
  COALESCE(COUNT(sbp.id), 0) AS counter,
  concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks sc
LEFT JOIN
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
ON
  sc.id = sbp.id
  AND sbp.severity = "Medium"
  AND sc.score = 1
  AND sbp.category = "Informational"
INNER JOIN hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
  ON sc.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id
WHERE
  sc.run_id = COALESCE (
    (
      SELECT
        MAX(run_id)
      FROM
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      WHERE
        completed = true
    ),
    (
      SELECT
        MAX(run_id)
      FROM
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      WHERE
        completed = true
    )
  )
GROUP BY
  sc.workspaceid, name;

datasets.name: 99c8064a
datasets.query:
Select
  results.workspaceid as workspaceid,
  concat(
    results.category,
    ' (Out of ',
    category_count,
    ')'
  ) as category,
  severity,
  severity_count,
  ord,
  concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity,
      sc.workspaceid,
      count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
      CASE
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'High' THEN 3
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2
        ELSE 1
      END as ord
    FROM
      hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks sc,
      hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
    where
      score = 1
      and sc.id = sbp.id
      and run_id = coalesce (
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
          where
            completed = true
        ),
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
          where
            completed = true
        )
      )
      and category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
    group by
    sc.workspaceid,
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity
  ) as results,
  (
    SELECT
      category,
      count(*) as category_count
    FROM
      hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices
    WHERE
      category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
    group by
      category
  ) as master
INNER JOIN hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
  ON results.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id
where
  results.category = master.category

datasets.name: 773a4e00
datasets.query:
SELECT
  ai.workspaceid,
  ai.name,
  ai.value.value,
  concat(ac.workspace_name, " (", ac.workspace_id, ")") as ws_name
FROM
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_info ai
INNER JOIN hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces ac
  ON ai.workspaceid = ac.workspace_id
where
  category = 'Account Stats'
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        completed = true
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        completed = true
    )
  )
ORDER BY
  name

datasets.name: e9e605a5
datasets.query:
SELECT
  check_time date,
  wrc. workspace_id,
  concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete wrc
INNER JOIN hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
  ON wrc.workspace_id = aw.workspace_id
where completed = true
ORDER BY date DESC

datasets.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
  BP.check_id,

  BP.category,

JOIN

WHERE BP.category = 'Governance' AND SC.workspaceid = WRC.workspace_id
ORDER BY Status DESC;

datasets.name: 97932cb4
datasets.query: SELECT * from ( SELECT sc1.score as current_score, sc2.score as previous_score, BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, sc1.score as Run1Status, sc2.score as Run2Status, sc1.check_time as Run1Date, sc2.check_time as Run2Date, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, sc1.workspaceid, concat(ac.workspace_name, " (", ac.workspace_id, ")") as name FROM hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks sc1, hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks sc2, hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices BP, hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces ac where sc2.workspaceid = sc1.workspaceid and sc1.id = sc2.id and sc1.id = BP.id and sc1.workspaceid = ac.workspace_id and sc1.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where completed = true and chk_date = :date1 ) and sc2.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where completed = true and run_id = ( select max(run_id) from hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where completed = true and chk_date = :date2 ) ) ) where name = :workspace_name

datasets.name: 3070fa90
datasets.query:
SELECT
  sc.workspaceid,
  COALESCE(COUNT(sbp.id), 0) AS counter,
  concat(aw.workspace_name, " (", aw.workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks sc
LEFT JOIN
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
ON
  sc.id = sbp.id
  AND sbp.severity = "Low"
  AND sc.score = 1
  AND sbp.category = "Informational"
INNER JOIN hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
  ON sc.workspaceid = aw.workspace_id
WHERE
  sc.run_id = COALESCE (
    (
      SELECT
        MAX(run_id)
      FROM
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      WHERE
        completed = true
    ),
    (
      SELECT
        MAX(run_id)
      FROM
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      WHERE
        completed = true
    )
  )
GROUP BY
  sc.workspaceid, name;

select
  sbp.check_id,
  sbp.check,
  sbp.recommendation,
  sc.additional_details,
  sbp.logic,
  if(
    sbp.evaluation_value == "-1",
    "N/A",
    sbp.evaluation_value
  ) as evaluation_value,
  regexp_replace(sbp.api, "<workspace_url>", aw.deployment_url) as api,
  sc.check_time
from
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp,
  hive_metastore.security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sc.run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        completed = true
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        hive_metastore.security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        completed = true
    )
  )
  and aw.workspace_id = sc.workspaceid

widget.name: 9988ec9c
widget.textbox_spec:
# Governance
* Cluster policy
* Audit logs (diagnostic logs on Azure)
* Init script
* DBFS mounts

widget.name: 642a6291
widget.textbox_spec:
# Data protection
* Secrets management
* Encryption
* Data exfiltration protections

widget.name: d3d2d724
widget.textbox_spec:
# Informational
* Admin counts
* ACLs
* User privileges
* Library and repo usage

widget.name: 3375bbf2
widget.textbox_spec:
# Network security
* Secure cluster connectivity (on Azure, NoPublicIP)
* Customer-managed VPC (or VNet injection)
* VPC (or VNet) peering  
* IP access lists

widget.name: 6015d16c
widget.textbox_spec:
# Identity & Access
* Single sign-on (AWS only, Azure and GCP always enabled)
* SCIM for user provisioning
* Role-based access control
* Token management
